entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Rancheria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
